titles.title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to require the Federal Trade Commission to submit to Congress a report on gasoline prices by November 8, 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/8/2005--Introduced. Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to make November 8, 2005, the deadline for the Federal Trade Commission's report to Congress on its investigation into whether the price of gasoline is being artificially manipulated by reduction in refinery capacity or by any other form of market manipulation or price gouging practices.
